name: Flight of the Cepheus
description:
Flight of the Cepheus is a turn-based simulation game where you try to safely and morally guide the framed starship Cepheus to the other side of the Galaxy.

All assets + code made in under 48 Hours for the Ludum Dare 46.

Source code provided in .gmx format.

Standalone .exe is less reliable than the installer, but quicker to use.

LDJAM
